attributes.action: disallow use of kettles, batons and other aggressive police tactics at entirely peaceful protests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of kettles, batons and other aggressive techniques at entirely peaceful, legitimate protests - such as the Climate Camp at Bishopsgate yesterday - are entirely unacceptable.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "disallow use of kettles, batons and other aggressive police tactics at entirely peaceful protests."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20245


Prime Minister's Office
